name: chorus-workspace
description: Chorus multi-agent orchestration system - workspace root

scripts.build:tools: cd src/tools && gren make Main --output=build/file-tools-tmp && tail -n +2 build/file-tools-tmp > build/file-tools.js && bun build --compile build/file-tools.js --outfile build/file-tools && rm build/file-tools-tmp
scripts.build:copy-ui: cp src/chorus-ui/build/app.js src/chorus/static/ && cp src/chorus-ui/static/index.html src/chorus/static/ && cp src/chorus-ui/static/styles.css src/chorus/static/
scripts.build:app: npm run build:ui && npm run build:tools && npm run build:chorus && npm run build:copy-ui
scripts.build:all: npm run build:app && npm run build:docker
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
